Description:
Quiet Court Location on 817sqm
The Feel:
Looking for a family home with extra space & the security of a court location? Look no further than this impeccably presented 3-bedroom home, with dual living, study, well-appointed kitchen & a huge backyard with room to extend in future. Ideally positioned between the CBD & the coast, this residence enjoys a private position with the Bellarine Rail Trail directly behind your fence for regular walks or rides. Delivering on quality & practicality, it provides easy, low maintenance living.
The Facts:
-3BR family home set on a substantial 817sqm allotment
-Neatly presented & privately tucked away at the end of Melissa Crt
-Natural light filled open plan living, meals & kitchen
-S/S apps include: Westinghouse electric oven, gas hob & Bosch dishwasher
-Direct access to outdoor entertaining area
-Neutral tones including quality tiled flooring, & carpets in bedrooms/formal living room
-Master bedroom with WIR & en suite (shower, vanity, WC)
-Zoned minor BRs with BIRs, family bathroom (bath/shower/vanity/sep WC) & laundry
-Study/home office located at front entry adjacent to Master
-Enviable storage throughout
-Ducted heating/evaporative cooling + ceiling fans
-Sealed driveway & paths with established plants & screen trees
-3,400L of rainwater storage + 3x3m garden shed
-Potential for extension in future with sunny orientation (STCA)
-Monitored security system
-OSP & DLUG, plus rear yard access to store a trailer/boat/caravan
-Pedestrian walkway to bordering Bellarine Rail Trail for daily family walks & rides
-A few short minutes by car to school, sporting clubs & Gateway Plaza shops
-10mins to Geelong CBD & 15mins to beach & cafes in Ocean Grove
The Owner Loves.
We love the quiet court position & its such a friendly neighbourhood... its central to everything a family needs & only a few minutes to the Gateway Plaza Shopping Centre, schools & sporting clubs.

Description:
With a Growing Family in Mind
This ideally located property is perfect for any growing family. Offering an expansive backyard and multiple living zones, there is plenty of room for everyone. Located within close proximity to Dorothy Street shopping strip, local parks, and Leopold Primary School, this home is sure to impress and tick many of your boxes.
Presenting four generous sized bedrooms, main, located at the front of the home, and containing his & hers walk through robes which lead into a 2-way ensuite. The remaining three bedrooms offer built-in robes and are serviced by a central bathroom and separate toilet.
The home includes a fully carpeted formal lounge with gas heating and split system cooling, adjoined with a large separate family room, ideal for casual living. The fully upgraded kitchen features stone benchtops, gas cooktop, built-in oven, stainless-steel dishwasher, ample cupboard space and overlooks the dining area, all of which is illuminated with natural light.
The property occupies 657m2 meaning a spacious backyard for all to enjoy, complete with a wonderful, elevated undercover alfresco area. This family-friendly yard is further accompanied by a garage/workshop, a garden shed for extra storage and an undercover carport for vehicle accommodation. Don't miss out on this amazing opportunity in an undeniably prime location of Leopold.

Description:
Rural property with bay views - best of both worlds
This 'Malishev' homestead property is a lifestyle marvel. With panoramic views across Port Phillip Bay to Mount Martha, sweeping around to Melbourne's pinnacle skyline. The property is well set up for horse lovers with fenced paddocks and stables.
The main open plan domain has direct access to the alfresco deck. Boasting gorgeous north-facing light. This space comprises of the kitchen with breakfast bar; two living areas and dining. The formal lounge is defined by the lowered step-level and open fireplace. The bedrooms are zoned in the southern wing, centred around the third living space.
The palatial master suite is distinctly separated and is adorned with a large WIR and luxury ensuite. The main bathroom has a timber and stone floating vanity and deep freestanding tub. The laundry offers plenty of storage and generous timber-top bench space.
Entertain in the indoor-outdoor room overlooking the saltwater pool. The duties of this boutique farm are well managed with the cattle yards, hayshed, stable & tack rooms, 3-phase power, the dam and 164KL rainwater tanks. The energy needs of the house are convincely met with gas and 20 x solar panels. Brilliantly located on the edge of Drysdale, you are offered seclusion while being a 4-minute drive to the centre of town. At the bottom of the driveway you also have access to the Bus Stop which is a ultra-convenient school pick point.
- Oversized DLUG with workshop.
- Zoned ducted heating/cooling
- Alarm system with motion sensors
- Electric fencing.

Description:
Stylish & Practical Family Living
If you're looking for the perfect family home without compromising on lifestyle, then don't go past this ideal single-level residence. Offering spacious luxury and elegant contemporary living, this property will leave you wanting nothing more.
A location with parks, playgrounds and sporting facilities just a short stroll away, as well as a short drive to the Leopold Gateway Plaza and easy access through to Geelong CBD.
This free-flowing floorplan offers four generously sized bedrooms, main bedroom offering a deluxe private ensuite and walk-in rob, while remaining three bedrooms contain built in robes and utilise the classy, central bathroom and separate toilet.
The ultra-modern kitchen boasts impressive bench space with custom cabinetry, high-quality, stainless-steel appliances including a dishwasher, free standing gas oven/ cooktop and rangehood. All overlooking the wonderfully open & spacious family and dining area, which leads through to the large separate living.
Additional features of this value-packed home include a separate laundry, split system heating/cooling, low maintenance landscaped garden with an impressive decked outdoor entertaining area, and a remote-controlled double garage with internal and external access.
Investors will appreciate the value, and first homebuyers can enter the market with certainty in a fast-growing, family-friendly community. Inspect today!

Description:
Country meets Coast - Lifestyle, Location and Landscape!
Welcomed by a traditional brick veneer duel level home set over one acre within a beautiful cul de sac location, east to west landscape; this four bedroom property offers an ideal setting for you and your family to retreat and cherish!
Picturesque gardens envelope the entire surrounds, highlighted by native wildlife, established trees & rear access to Moorfield lake and parkland creating an unmatched ambience. A cleverly designed family home has been built to last the test of time and accommodate any family in comfort within vast interior space, from the duel level living zones, separate rumpus room including a pool table and T.V entertainment system.
The spacious master bedroom accompanied with a well-appointed ensuite & WIR, remaining three bedrooms are allocated large BIRs and all come with brand new carpet. Both formal and casual dining areas are on offer to accommodate festive occasions year round with the kitchen supplying an electric oven & gas stove top, an abundance of cupboard space and ample bench space.
An additional study/home office, offers the flexibility to work from home. Including ducted heating, evaporative cooling and two extra split systems. Semi rural assets embrace a rear wrap-around alfresco area, established citrus trees, large machinery garage, chicken coop or birdcage and a remote double DLUG.
Central location in the heart of Wallington promotes a peaceful lifestyle, with the dual advantages of a short trip to Geelong CBD and the coastal attraction of Ocean Grove and Point Lonsdale close by. All sporting, medical and schooling facilities are just a short drive away, with even a school bus drop-off zone at the entrance of the estate, harnessing a stress free lifestyle, on your own slice of rural paradise.

Description:
8 ACRES IN CERES! Open by private inspection only
This grand lifestyle residence with impressive hill-top positioning and sweeping views of Ceres and its surrounds will captivate each and every individual. Within short commuting distance of both Geelong and Melbourne, this homestead style property could be yours. Offering an exceptional opportunity to acquire approx. 8 acres located in Ceres in the rolling hills of Barrabool where peace and tranquillity become a way of life. Enjoy a cup of tea on the verandah that wraps around the entirety of the home allowing you to be captivated by what surrounds you.
Kitchen- double sink, 900mm stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, copious amount of timber paneled cabinetry storage including overhead cupboards, island bench with plenty of space for preparation, windows wrapping around the kitchen for glorious views of your large outdoor space, slate tiling throughout and a spacious walk in pantry
Open plan living/ dining- slate tiling throughout, ceiling fan, downlights, pendant lighting, sky lights, fireplace, glass panel doors opening out to alfresco, curtains for privacy, linen press, split system cooling
Study- slate tiling throughout, door to verandah, downlights, pendant light
Dining- secluded next door to kitchen with door to shut it off, large windows with beautiful views, slate tiling throughout, pendant lighting suspended from decorative ceiling rose, a fully functional bar space to serve your guests
Sitting room- carpeted, large open windows facing out to views of your property and its surrounds (Melbourne can be spotted from here), pendant lighting suspended from decorative ceiling rose, pendant wall lighting, fire place, shelving for decorative pieces, steps up into formal dining space and bar
Master bedroom- carpeted, ceiling fan, downlights, door for access to verandah, large walk in robe, dressing room and ensuite with double vanity, twin sinks and large cupboards, spa bath, timber panel detailed walls, window with stunning views, shower, separate toilet
Bedrooms 2- carpet, ceiling fan, downlights, access to bathroom, separate study section and large walk in robe
Bedroom 3- carpet, ceiling fan, downlights, access to bathroom
Guest bedroom- carpet, ceiling fan, downlights, door to verandah, ensuite with single vanity, shower, easy access to powder room
Main bathroom- separate powder room, double vanity, twin sinks, bath, shower, access from both bedrooms, powder room can be accessed from hallway for guests
Studio- separate to main house, carpet, storage, split system cooling
Outdoor- long driveway leading into the property secluding your home and providing tranquility and privacy, double garage, double carpet, 3x sheds, 2x undercover storage spaces, verandah wrapping around the home for 360 degree views of Ceres, Geelong and its surrounds, luscious established vegetation and well manicured lawns and gardens surrounding the property, 3x large water tanks
Mod cons- slate tiling and carpets throughout, laundry with large bench space, intercom and radio system through entirety of property, fireplace in both living spaces
Close by facilities: 45 minute drive to Melbourne, 15 minute drive to Geelong, 8 minute drive to Waurn Ponds train station, 5 minute drive to Deakin University (all approx)
Views: ocean, river, You Yangs, Brisbane Ranges, Melbourne, sweeping views of Geelong and its surrounds
Ideal for: families, growing families, retirees, couples, investors
*ALL ATTENDEES MUST SHOW PHOTO ID PRIOR TO VIEWING THE HOME*

Description:
Character, Charm & Only Minutes to the Bay!
Perfectly located in a sought after and elevated pocket of Clifton Springs, this quaint abode will delight.
Storybook charm, as you're welcomed by a full length, undercover verandah, with warming timber floorboards and stunning raked ceilings upon entry. The open plan lounge offers soaring feature windows with Bay glimpses and with Winter now upon us, the cosy fireplace radiates warmth throughout the entire home. The fully renovated kitchen with SS appliances overlooks the dining, which effortlessly flows into an optional 2nd living/dining. The master retreat sits at the rear, with WIR and renovated full en-suite. The remaining 2 bedrooms host BIR's and serviced by the family bathroom, with a separate toilet and laundry completing this functional family home.
A paved decked area for effortless outdoor entertaining, coupled with a large open grassed space with room for the kids to run amuck - a wealth of options are on offer.
Additional features include - double carport, manicured gardens front and back, garden shed, secure gates to the backyard, heating, cooling, and feature ceiling fans.
Public transport, schools and all major amenities are on your doorstep, with the rest of the booming Bellarine only moments away, secure your slice of paradise today!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
High On The Hill
Perfectly positioned high on the block with brilliant views of the water towards Geelong and the You Yangs, 5 Gumarooka Avenue is an awesome property and a perfect addition to your property portfolio or first home. Comprising 3 bedrooms, central bathroom, formal lounge with views from all windows, open plan kitchen family room, 2 air conditioning units, Solar electricity to keep bills down and a rear yard perfect for the veggie patch. A property with features including northerly sun flowing into in the living areas, unobstructed views of the water & a high setting on the hill will attract a lot of attention, so be quick to book your inspection today!!

Description:
NEAT, SWEET and COMPLETE!
Perfect entry level home on 605m2. Surrounded by established houses in a quiet tree-lined street in Clifton Springs within close proximity to shopping, schooling and boating facilities.
Immaculately presented inside and out ! Painting done, flooring done, kitchen done and bathroom done !!! First home buyers or retirees alike will fall in love with this quaint home. The interior living spaces are flooded with northern light and your modern kitchen looks out to manicured garden beds. Two bedrooms with BIRs and the third bedroom could double as a study or home office. The tastefully, renovated bathroom has a large bath, over-sized shower and euro washing space.
Features include 900ss oven, dw, LED downlights, stained timber bench tops, bedroom ceiling fans, feature mantel and modern square - cut cornices.
Plenty of yard space for vehicles or a boat. To the rear of the property the double colorbond garage has concrete flooring and ample yard space for the children to play.
Inspection a must !

Description:
DESIRABLE POSITION , ONE OF THE BEST! 944 SQM IN DRYSDALE.
Presentation is perfect with new carpets, some new window furnishings, painted throughout, all for the astute new owner to enjoy this large home and land. Gracious entrance with light and bright open plan area to the right including timber kitchen, generous dining and living. A second lounge room (could be two rooms) is magnificent........the living is easy with so much room. Three large bedrooms ( all with WIR) , study, central bathroom, laundry and separate toilet. Some features include, high ceilings, leadlight, rosettes, 2 gas heaters, large pantry, some double glazed windows, extra insulation and more. The garden is leafy and private but still allows the natural light to enhance all living areas. Double garage with tandem to rear yard, extra space for further access and small sheds as well. Walk to Drysdale village, schools, medical facilities and all amenities. The beauty of the Bellarine Peninsula is on your doorstep with wineries, fine restaurants and the Portarlington ferry to the city....a real gem.

Description:
Polished Renovation Equipped for a Dream Lifestyle
One step inside this stunning residence and you will instantly notice it's been built and renovated to exceed expectations for all buyers. Designed to take advantage of the abundance of natural light, the kitchen truly is the heart of the home with it's adjoining dining and living area that provide a seamless connection to the expansive outdoor entertainment area and rear yard.
Completely move-in ready, this is the perfect opportunity for first home buyers, investors and families alike, the astute buyer will find terrific growth in the home while enjoying all the spoils the home has to offer without lifting a finger.
- Three spacious bedrooms, master walk-in robe and ensuite
- Spare bedrooms share an oversized walk-in robe
- Impressive Chef's kitchen with electric cooktop, stainless steel appliances
- Ducted central heating, ceiling fans throughout, split-system cooling
- Quality renovation throughout, two great sized alfrescos
- Spacious and private rear yard, low maintenance gardens
- Off-street parking for up to six cars
- Five minutes to Leopold Primary School and local shopping center
- Five minutes to Bellarine Peninsula's greatest wineries
- 15 Minutes to Geelong CBD, Waterfront and Botanical Gardens

Description:
A Dream Block, Ready and Waiting For Your Dream Home!
Often sought, yet rarely found, this is your unique opportunity to secure an elevated block in a desired and private pocket of Clifton Springs.
Boasting a 584m2 (approx.) allotment with a 15m frontage and encompassing views of the Bay and beyond that need to be appreciated in real life to truly believe. Due to the elevated positioned, the views can be enjoyed whether your dream home consists of a single level build or that lavish 2 storey design - let your imagination run wild!
A bonus for this parcel, is that it's already equipped with a perfectly positioned, 9.2 x 6m garage at the rear and complete with a water tank and planter boxes.
A 5-minute stroll has you tipping your toes in the Bay, with access to a tucked away and sheltered beach for safe, family swimming and all major amenities including public transport, shops and schools at your fingertips. With the Bellarine Peninsula's market going from strength to strength, this prime and unique allotment will not last long!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Space & Natural Beauty On Acreage With Stunning Outlook
The Feel:
Wideacre is a 4.3acre lifestyle property that presents boundless opportunities for sustainable semi-rural living, with established natives, orchard & vegetable gardens that will bear plentiful harvests for years to come. Beautifully appointed with sweeping natural views from every vantage point, it is flanked by neighbouring picturesque farmland, delivering a palpable sense of serenity & space. Enjoy the views from 270 decks or the comfort of a fireside lounge, all just minutes from schools & amenities.
The Facts:
-One of the Bellarines best kept secrets, tucked away in a secluded location
-Towering Redgums, Eucalypts & Cypress trees beckon your arrival
-Elevated position captures expansive views of verdant lawns & rainbow trout-stocked dam
-All living, meals & kitchen areas are orientated to frame inspiring views
-270 wraparound decks including a semi-enclosed sunroom for all-weather entertaining
-Kitchen features quality s/s apps incl: Bosch wall oven, DW & Westinghouse electric hotplates
-Solitaire Eureka wood fire + ducted heating/evaporative cooling delivers lifestyle appeal
-Second living/ sitting area adjoins the kitchen & flows out to deck
-Wake to garden views from king-size Master bedroom, with en-suite & WIR
-2 more carpeted BRs feature BIRs & stunning garden views
-Central bathroom has shower, spa bath, vanity & separate toilet
-Tiled floors to heavy traffic areas & plush carpet to living & bedrooms
-Fully fenced yard with rabbit proofing; lawn offers space for children & pets to play
-Raised vegie garden beds, abundant orchard (apricot/pear/apple/orange/nectarine)
-9,000L tank w/ pump to vegie garden + 1,600L tank for additional rainwater storage
-30x20m DLUG garage with workshop + large machinery shed, single carport, hothouse & fernery!
-Rustic wine cellar under the house
-A few short minutes by car to schools, bay & coastal towns & easy access to Bypass
The Owner Loves.
Every day, we sit out in the sunroom on the deck & read the paper with a cup of coffee. By the afternoon, the sunsets are glorious & we can see the distant twinkling lights of Geelong beyond the rural outlook. Coming home to Wideacre has always been a great thing.

Description:
Your Dream Family Lifestyle Starts Here
If youre looking for a home that ticks every box, then look no further! Featuring updated interiors, a spacious backyard, and an oversized double garage with workshop, every inch of this property will delight!
With everything you could possibly need within walking distance, locations dont get much better than this. Public transport is footsteps from your front door, while a short stroll will find you at the popular Rolling Pin Bakery or Gateway Plaza. The whole family will be inspired to venture outdoors with both local sporting grounds and the Gateway Sanctuary moments away. To top it all off, Leopold Primary School is within easy reach, along with the Leopold Community Hub and Leopold Library.
Showcasing a cathedral ceiling with highlight windows, the expansive living zone will quickly become your favourite room in the whole house. The large bookcase makes a stylish statement, while sliding doors open onto the lush backyard. An abundance of natural light makes this an enticing setting all year round, with a wood heater creating a cosy ambience during the cooler months. The open plan kitchen/dining zone flows onto the sheltered alfresco, which sets the scene for casual outdoor living and provides effortless entertaining options. The kitchen features clean-lined cabinetry, a built-in pantry, and stainless steel appliances (Bosch dishwasher and Emilia oven, gas cooktop, rangehood).
The generous Master Bedroom creates a relaxing oasis for parents with a walk-in robe and en suite with floor-to-ceiling tiling. Three additional bedrooms feature built-in robes, with one bedroom boasting direct access to the main bathroom. The separate toilet and laundry complete the layout. Modcons include evaporative cooling, a split-system air conditioner, and Foxtel connection.
The north-facing backyard creates a wealth of space for children and pets to play freely. The remote lock-up garage accommodates two vehicles plus a large workshop making this an ideal choice for tradies and DIY-lovers! The rear roller door provides backyard vehicle access, with dedicated storage behind the house for a caravan or trailer.
With so much to offer, an inspection of this beautiful property is a must! Enquire today!

Description:
Quality at Every Turn
Perfectly situated on a generous allotment of 680m2 and nestled in a tightly-held pocket of Leopold, this architecturally-designed residence promises sensational family living!
The quiet location is only a short stroll from public transport and easy access to the sporting facilities of Leopold Memorial Reserve. Leopold Primary School and Leopold Community Hub are wonderfully close by for families, along with the expansive Gateway Plaza which takes care of all of your shopping needs.
High ceilings and timber flooring that flow throughout the home enhance the immaculate interiors. The spacious main bedroom, positioned at the front of the home, creates a peaceful haven for parents. Luxury is featured in the walk-in robe, private ensuite, which is complete with a large shower, single vanity, spa bath and toilet, and direct access to your own private undercover deck area. The remain two bedrooms with built-in robes and share close access to the main bathroom.
The spacious open plan living zone creates the hub of the home. Bathed in natural sunlight and opening through multiple glass doors to the private backyard - creating a beautiful indoor-outdoor connection that is ideal for entertaining! The stunning Tupac kitchen creates the focus of the open plan living zone, showcasing waterfall stone benchtops, quality stainless-steel appliances, including SMEG freestanding 900mm gas cooktop, dual drawer dishwasher, SMEG microwave, Bosch stainless steel fridge and ample soft-touch cupboards & drawers.
Youll love relaxing under the shaded alfresco surrounded by leafy gardens. The generous backyard is an outdoor oasis for children and adults alike. An array of veggies in the gardens invites you to enjoy your own fresh produce straight from the source!
The remote double lock-up garage features internal access, as well as the undercover carport for extra vehicle storage.
Added features include 2x split-system heating & cooling to keep you comfortable in all seasons, cedarwood skirts, window sills and doors throughout, R3 insulation, café weather blinds, garden shed & stunning water feature.
This quality home represents an outstanding lifestyle choice in Leopold, one of Geelong's high growth suburbs. This home would appeal to those looking for space and privacy while still having the luxury of all amenities close by. Don't delay inspecting this magnificent family home!

Central Walk Estate is within a short distance to all of Drysdale amenities, including supermarkets, schools, local shopping, array of cafes, medical facilities and public transport.

Description:
Lifestyle Home With Sweeping Views
The Feel:
Situated in an elevated position in the popular Estuary Estate, this wonderful family home presents as new & offers true versatility, with 3-4 bedrooms & multiple living areas. A customised alfresco creates a seamless connection to outdoor living, with westerly aspects capitalising on spectacular sunsets & incredible sweeping views. Fully landscaped, with a productive garden, cubby & room to park the trailer, families will love being 200m from the Reserve & minutes from Gateway Shopping Centre, school, kinder & onward to Geelong CBD.
The Facts:
-Quality custom-built brick veneer residence by Dennis Family Homes
-200m to playground, sporting ovals & Reserve
-Inviting entry, neutral colour scheme, Tassie Oak accents & polished concrete floors
-Spacious open plan living, meals & kitchen with high ceilings & decorative cornices
-Stunning, well-planned kitchen with island bench & WIP
-Stainless steel appliances (900mm Westinghouse oven, gas hob, Asko DW)
-Statement piece pendant over meals area, with seamless connection to outdoor area
-Dedicated Study buds off kitchen/meals area, with panoramic west aspect
-Covered alfresco with exposed aggregate concrete base & light-filtering pergola
-Custom-built/space-saving outdoor dining & bar setting
-Spectacular sweeping views including the iconic lights of GMHBA Stadium
-Ducted heating throughout, SSAC units to main living & 2nd living
-Versatile 2nd living/media room/4th bedroom with north aspect endorses family-friendly design
-Spacious Master BR with his n hers WIR, en suite featuring shower, toilet & vanity
-Zoned wing to 2 more bedrooms with BIRs & dedicated kids lounge/rumpus/study
-Central bathroom with relaxing bath tub, vanity, shower & separate toilet
-Fenced yard w/ amazing cubby, climbing gym & outdoor hot shower
-Low maintenance garden includes raised vegie beds & various productive fruit trees
-Double glazed windows to most, solar hot water,
-Exposed aggregate driveway to RC DLUG with internal & rear yard access, side gate for trailer
The Owner Loves.
We spend so much time outside, and purpose-built the raised dining setting to take advantage of our elevated position, the sunsets are absolutely beautiful here. Inside, its a great family home, with communal spaces & areas for individual pursuits.

Description:
The Ultimate lifestyle property on the edge of town.
Set on a sprawling 3.3 acres this lovely country property has everything you will need to enjoy a country lifestyle in this beautiful part of the Bellarine. The home itself features 4 bedroom, Study, 2 living 3 bathrooms, laundry, mud room and large rumpus. The property has established gardens including numerous fruit trees and vegie boxes. Double shed with power and water tank, chook sheds, horse shelters and fenced off paddocks. Ideally located it is only moments away from Drysdale town centre, Wineries, 7 minutes to Portarlington and the Clifton Springs boat ramp and only 25 minutes to the Geelong CBD. The home features a stunning large open plan kitchen, dining and lounge. The renovated the kitchen is a stylish combination of stone and solid timber benchtops and includes a free standing SS Gas cooktop and oven and dishwasher. This really is the hub of the home and enjoys views of the property. Climate control is achieved using 2 split system air conditioners, 2 Coonara style wood heaters and ceiling fans. The master bathroom is off the main entrance and features an ensuite and walk in robe. In addition 2 more bedrooms, the partially renovated central bathroom and laundry are located towards the middle of the home. Beyond this is a large rumpus room and generous study/5th bedroom. Towards the rear of the home is the 4th bedroom, another lounge with bar/2nd kitchen including built in keg tap and servery window connecting to the massive outdoor area (8x12metre) which boasts exposed aggregate with built barbeque and spa. From here you will enjoy sweeping views of the landscape and enjoy a country property atmosphere right on the edge of the town! Flexible floorplan with room to improve or simply move in. Proximity to shops, Portarlington Marina, boat ramps, wineries and the Geelong CBD make this a truly desirable property and rare opportunity.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
WALK THE PARKLANDS TO THE BEACH.......FABULOUS POSITION!
No. 86 is situated in a leafy and private area (approx. 635 SQM) with walkways to the bay, a real haven for the astute buyer. A solid build comprising of tiled entrance through to a spacious formal lounge room, a second open plan space with solid timber kitchen, meals and living overlooking the rear garden. Three bedrooms, main with ensuite and WIR, other two have BIR'S, central bathroom with spa, separate toilet and laundry. Features include gas heating and air conditioning, fireplace, double pantry, dishwasher, split system, new fences and more. Double garage has been partly converted for office, maybe bungalow. A gem of a property with bush appeal, yet minutes from the water.

Description:
SPACE ! VIEWS ! 2 DWELLINGS MAYBE (STCA) , 2 CROSSOVERS.
Hard to get in an established area , where you can build your dream home now or wait until the time is right. The size and corner position of No. 48 allows for the chance to build 2 (STCA) , one for you , another for extended family or develop in the future. Bay views can be part of your new residence if desired.........just take the time to ring and talk , make an inspection now with me. A rare find here at No. 48 Dandarriga, on the edge of the residential pocket with the cullinary delights of the Bellarine Peninsula on your doorstep.
